remarks: Distributive law for inner product (right-distributivity).  Equation I3 of [Ponnusamy] p. 362.  Complex version of ~ ipdir .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphipcj.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
cphipcj.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cphdir.P $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
cphdir $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( ( A .+ B ) ., C ) = ( ( A ., C ) + ( B ., C ) ) ) $.
